no.mnemonic.services.customernetwork.spi.description: Response containing information on a customer domain

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the domain was created

deletedTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the domain was deleted

domainName.description: Fully qualified name of the domain (FQDN)

flags.description: Set of flags set on the domain

items.description: Set of flags set on the domain

lastUpdatedByUser.description: User that last updated the domain

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the domain was last updated

no.mnemonic.services.customernetwork.spi.description: A request to search for customer domains

customer.description: Limit search to domains with the given customers, identified by id or shortname

items.description: Limit search to domains with the given customers, identified by id or shortname

domainName.description: The set of exact customer domain names to search for

items.description: The set of exact customer domain names to search for

endTimestamp.description: Restrict search to data before this time (epoch millis) according to selected TimeFieldStrategies. Allows unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time specifies. See https://docs.mnemonic.no/x/AQDXAQ  Allows to specify a unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.

items.description: Flags to exclude

includeDeleted.description: Whether to include deleted domains in the search (default false). Only allowed for users with `viewDeletedCustomerDomains` permission

items.description: Flags to include

includeSubDomains.description: Whether to search for subdomains of specified domains

includeSuperDomains.description: Whether to search for parent domains of specified domains

keywordFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

keywordMatchStrategy.description: Defines how strict different keywords should be matched

keywords.description: Search for keywords against fields defined by KeywordFieldStrategy

items.description: Search for keywords against fields defined by KeywordFieldStrategy

sortBy.description: Specify the order of results. Prefix with '-' to order descending.

items.description: Specify the order of results. Prefix with '-' to order descending.

startTimestamp.description: Restrict search to data after this time (epoch millis) according to selected TimeFieldStrategies. Allows unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time specifies. See https://docs.mnemonic.no/x/AQDXAQ  Allows to specify a unix timestamp (milliseconds), ISO timestamp, or relative time.

subCriteria.description: The set of sub criteria to add to the search

timeFieldStrategy.description: Defines which timestamps will be included in the search

items.description: Defines which timestamps will be included in the search

timeMatchStrategy.description: Defines how strict different keywords should be matched

user.description: Search using users identified by id or shortname. If given a group, we will resolve all members of the group recursively

items.description: Search using users identified by id or shortname. If given a group, we will resolve all members of the group recursively

userFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by user

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by user

userMatchStrategy.description: Defines how strict different keywords should be matched

no.mnemonic.jargus.model.CustomerNetwork.description: Response containing information on a customer network comment

no.mnemonic.jargus.model.UserInfo.description: User which created the customer network

no.mnemonic.jargus.model.CustomerNetwork.description: Response containing information on a customer network

createdByUser.description: User which created the customer network

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp of creation of the customer network

customer.description: Customer that the network belongs to

items.description: Flags assigned to the object.

lastUpdatedByUser.description: Last user which updated the customer network

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: Timestamp of last update of the customer network

location.description: DEPRECATED. Location where the network is

networkAddress.description: IP address of the customer network

no.mnemonic.jargus.model.LocationInfo.description: DEPRECATED. Location where the network is

no.mnemonic.jargus.net.IPNetworkAddress.description: IP address of the customer network

no.mnemonic.jargus.criteria.customer.Cus.description: Request to search for customer networks

offset.description: Skip the first (offset) objects. By default, return result from first object.

includeDeleted.description: Set to true to include deleted objects. By default, exclude deleted objects.

subCriteria.description: Set additional criterias which are applied using a logical OR.

exclude.description: Only relevant for subcriteria. If set to true, objects matching this subcriteria object will be excluded.

required.description: Only relevant for subcriteria. If set to true, objects matching this subcriteria are required (AND-ed together with parent criteria).

customerID.description: Restrict search to data belonging to specified customers.

items.description: Restrict search to data belonging to specified customers.

addresses.description: A set of IP addresses matched against networks

includeSupernet.description: Network in search criteria will be searched for matching supernets

includeSubnet.description: Network in search criteria will be searched for matching subnets

includeSubCustomers.description: If true, customer criteria will be expanded to include their sub customers when searching for customer networks.

keywords.description: A set of keywords matched against network's description

items.description: A set of keywords matched against network's description

keywordMatchStrategy.description: KeywordMatchStrategy to define how keywords are queried for logically i.e. equivalent of AND/OR

keywordFieldStrategy.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

items.description: Defines which fields will be searched by keywords

timeMatchStrategy.description: TimeMatchStrategy to define how to match startTimestamp and endTimestamp with provided timeFieldStrategies

timeFieldStrategy.description: TimeFieldStrategy to define which timestamp field(s) to match.

items.description: TimeFieldStrategy to define which timestamp field(s) to match.

sortBy.description: List of properties to sort by (prefix with "-" to sort descending).

items.description: List of properties to sort by (prefix with "-" to sort descending).

includeFlags.description: Only include objects which have includeFlags set.

items.description: Only include objects which have includeFlags set.

excludeFlags.description: Exclude objects which have excludeFlags set.

items.description: Exclude objects which have excludeFlags set.

customer.description: Customer ID or short name of the customer that the domain belongs to

domainName.description: Fully qualified name of the domain (FQDN)

description.description: Description of the domain. Maximum number of characters is 2048.

errors.description: Information about networks that were rejected

rejected.description: The number of networks that were rejected and not added

domain.description: The domain of the customer. Defaults to the current user's domain

no.mnemonic.jargus.service.request.custo.description: Request model for updating a network

description.description: Description of the customer network. Maximum number of characters is 2048.

flagsToDisable.description: Flags to disable for the network. A permission check if performed to verify that the user is allowed to disable the flags

items.description: Flags to disable for the network. A permission check if performed to verify that the user is allowed to disable the flags

flagsToEnable.description: Flags to enable for the network. A permission check if performed to verify that the user is allowed to set the flags

items.description: Flags to enable for the network. A permission check if performed to verify that the user is allowed to set the flags

flagsToSet.description: Flags to set for the network. This property takes precedence over the content of flagsToEnable and flagsToDisable properties. A permission check if performed to verify that the user is allowed to set the flags, and disable any flags already present on the network.

items.description: Flags to set for the network. This property takes precedence over the content of flagsToEnable and flagsToDisable properties. A permission check if performed to verify that the user is allowed to set the flags, and disable any flags already present on the network.

location.description: DEPRECATED. Location ID or short name of the location where the network is located
